abstract: President Obama’s nominee as chairman of the Council of Economic Advisers combines sophisticated economics research with a keen appreciation of public policy, an economist writes.
snippet: President Obama’s nominee as chairman of the Council of Economic Advisers combines sophisticated economics research with a keen appreciation of public policy, an economist writes.

headline.main: Sizing Up Obama’s Nominee as Chief Economist

abstract: Shares of BlackRock rose more than 5 percent on Tuesday after the money manager’s chief executive, Laurence D. Fink, said that he was seeing much stronger cash inflows from investors in the third quarter.
snippet: Shares of BlackRock rose more than 5 percent on Tuesday after the money manager’s chief executive, Laurence D. Fink, said that he was seeing much stronger cash inflows from investors in the third quarter.
lead_paragraph: Shares of BlackRock rose more than 5 percent on Tuesday after the money management firm’s chief executive, Laurence D. Fink, said that he was seeing much stronger cash inflows from investors in the third quarter.

headline.main: BlackRock’s Shares Climb as Outlook Brightens
